title: Sony WH-CH720NB Noise Canceling Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Built-in Microphone - up to 35 Hours Battery Life and Quick Charge - Black - International Version
description: Sony’s lightest Wireless Noise-canceling headband ever Integrated Processor V1 lets you immerse in the music Super comfortable and lightweight design Adjustable Ambient Sound mode and Adaptive Sound control Up to 35-hour battery life with quick charging High sound quality and well-balanced sound tuning Crystal clear hands-free calling Voice assistant with Precise Voice Pickup technology Multipoint connection allows you to switch between 2 devices. Build-in microphone
